title: Chiefs Ravens Recap, Opinion or Truth Game Show and TNF Preview
itunes:title: Chiefs Ravens Recap, Opinion or Truth Game Show and TNF Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Colleen Wolfe, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal recap the battle of the MVPs from Monday night (3:13). The heroes fill you in on the latest coronavirus scare that might impact the Week 4 slate of games (15:45) before heading into a new game show called "Opinion or Truth" (21:49). We end the show by previewing the highest anticipated TNF showdown of the season between the Jets and the Broncos. (46:06)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
